content: All 6 articles are official statements from various Chinese government authorities condemning the violent incident that occurred on July 1st in Hong Kong, where protesters stormed the Legislative Council building. They all express strong condemnation of the violence, support for the Hong Kong SAR government and police in handling the incident, and the need to uphold the rule of law and maintain social order in Hong Kong. Some articles also criticize foreign countries for interfering in Hong Kong's affairs and
